About me:

My name is Adefolami Akintokun. I am a Front end Web developer. I build responsive, interactive and user-friendly websites and web applications. I am committed to learning and personal growth so I am usually up to date with emerging technologies in my field. I use modern technologies such as React, Javascript, HTML and CSS to bring designs to life. I ensure a seamless experience web experience for users by providing accessible and relatable content, fast loading speed and responsiveness.

Featured Projects:

Here are some of the projects i have worked on

NATOURS

A web app for a tour company. This web app shows the essential features of the website and talks about the company. It helps tourists choose great tour options from a selection of options and also offers different payment options depending on the size of the tour group.

Github repo Live link

HOUSE OWNERS

This is a website for a real estate company. It showcases the different types of houses availale at the time and their prices. It also gives answers to questions that have been freqently asked by customers and past clients. It also has a page where people can join their community to get updates on new available properties and changes in prices.

Github repo Live link

BANKIST

This is a bank app that helps users send and receive money from other bank users. It also provides ways of helping users track and manage their spendings. It also has a loan feature for users that might need a loan.

Github repo Live link

GUESSING GAME

This is a game created mainly with javascript. Players have to guess correctly a number that is selected at random from 1 to 50. Every player starts with 20 points each and their scores reduces with each incorrect guess. The game ends when the player is able to guess the number correctly.

Github repo Live link
